chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Shadow in Shienar
chapters.info: Einor Saren, p. 73 (65)—Second-in-command of the Hand of the Light, more commonly known as the Questioners, in Tarabon. His superior is Jaichim Carridin. He meets Geofram Bornhald in a field to deliver new orders to him. Bornhald was suspicious of the fact that a Questioner was sent with his new orders.
